  • Method Details

    • getName

      public String getName()
      Gets the name of the entity.
      Returns:
      the name of the entity.

    • getPower

      public Integer getPower()
      Gets the power level of the entity.
      Returns:
      the power level of the entity as an Integer.

    • setPower

      protected void setPower(Integer power)
      Sets the power level of the entity.
      Parameters:
      power - the power level of the entity as an Integer.

    • getHealth

      public Integer getHealth()
      Gets the current health of the entity.
      Returns:
      the current health of the entity as an Integer.

    • getCurrentDivision

      public Division getCurrentDivision()
      Retrieves the current division the entity is located in.
      Returns:
      the current Division object representing the entity's location.

    • isAlive

      public boolean isAlive()
      Determines if the entity is alive.
      Returns:
      true if the entity has health greater than 0, false otherwise.

    • takeDamage

      public void takeDamage(int damage)
      Decreases the entity's health by a given amount. If the entity's health falls to 0 or below, the entity is considered dead and a message is printed to the console.
      Parameters:
      damage - the amount of damage to apply to the entity's health.

    • heal

      public void heal(int heal)
      Increases the entity's health by a given amount. The entity's health is increased by the given amount, but will not exceed the entity's maximum health.
      Parameters:
      heal - the amount of health to add to the entity's health.

    • getMaxHealth

      public int getMaxHealth()
      Gets the maximum health the entity can have.
      Returns:
      the maximum health of the entity as an Integer.

    • setHealth

      public void setHealth(int health)
      Sets the entity's health to a given value. The entity's health is set to the given value, but will not exceed the entity's maximum health.
      Parameters:
      health - the new health value as an Integer.

    • getTag

      public String getTag()
      Constructs a tag string representing the entity's name and current health.
      Returns:
      a string in the format "[Name - Health â™¥]" where "Name" is the entity's name and "Health" is the current health of the entity.

    • print

      public void print(String message)
      Prints a message to the console with the entity's tag prepended to it.
      Parameters:
      message - the message to print to the console.
